issue.title: Problems stopping all processes associated with ignition

content.raw: Today I was not able to quit with ctrl\+c as well. I had to take down the docker container \(sha256:1145790d83973b37bd4851e6e329d24de062a99e19f898e22438c9d3882c00a6\). I am glad I didn’t run it locally as it would have been pain to kill all that stuff by hand.
content.html: Today I was not able to quit with ctrl+c as well. I had to take down the docker container (sha256:1145790d83973b37bd4851e6e329d24de062a99e19f898e22438c9d3882c00a6). I am glad I didn’t run it locally as it would have been pain to kill all that stuff by hand.
